content.d: Yesterday’s event was so much fun.
We got really close to everyone!
Yes, being able to hear everyone’s voices directly made it such a wonderful event!
It’s nice to have events where we can enjoy chatting, too!
You’re right. We’re able to learn a lot from the feedback we receive.
Yup! I discovered something new I want to try!
I hope we can talk a lot with everyone again today.
Yeah! And let’s make today even more exciting than yesterday!
Wow, thank you so much! Let’s eat!
With these, we’ll be able to charge up our power completely!
